thread.title: PUSCASU ANDREI

author: PUSCASU ANDREI
title: PUSCASU ANDREI
text: Casa la Salle is a nice place to stay and the price is really good. It is not full of comfort, but is simple and clean. The housekeepers clean the room daily and change the towels. The breakfast is nice. I think that they could have more fruits and vegetables, but in rest is fine. It is really simple to arrive from the city center to the hotel (taking metro or bus no 916)
